vote.title: Authorize a three-year master agreement for the purchase of fire hydrants, parts, and accessories for the Water Utilities Department - Mueller Co. LLC in an estimated amount of $1,517,300, North Texas Winwater Co. in an estimated amount of $282,000, Core & Main LP in an estimated amount of $94,000, and U.S. Pipe Valve & Hydrant, LLC in an estimated amount of $47,000, lowest responsible bidders of seven - Total estimated amount of $1,940,300 - Financing:  Dallas Water Utilities Fund
